entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
